attributes.action: Scrap Smart Motorways in England and stop the 40pmh regular speed restrictions.
attributes.background: Stop Highways England from opening the hard shoulder and stop the unnecessary 40mph speed limit, which is used by Highways England regularly without any incident and for several miles at a time, bringing traffic to a standstill, creating pollution and adding to journey time, doubling in some cases.
